title: China's bond market intervention reveals financial stability worries
content: The country's latest efforts to stem a bond market rally shows that authorities are worried about financial stability, analysts said.
summary: The country's latest efforts to stem a bond market rally shows that authorities are worried about financial stability, analysts said.

title: Tencent-backed Airwallex nears $500 million annualized sales, aims to get IPO-ready by 2026
content: Payments startup Airwallex is nearing an annual revenue run rate of $500 million and will be ready for an IPO by 2026, CEO Jack Zhang told CNBC.
summary: Payments startup Airwallex is nearing an annual revenue run rate of $500 million and will be ready for an IPO by 2026, CEO Jack Zhang told CNBC.

title: Bank of Japan will take longer to hike rates given the yen's rapid strengthening, BMI says
content: Following market turbulence, BOJ's Deputy Governor Uchida Shinichi released a statement affirming that the bank would not raise rates amid market instability.
summary: Following market turbulence, BOJ's Deputy Governor Uchida Shinichi released a statement affirming that the bank would not raise rates amid market instability.

title: China reports slight beat in July retail sales, but industrial data disappoint
content: Other data for July released in the last two weeks have indicated consumer demand remains sluggish.

title: Japan second-quarter GDP beats expectations, expands 0.8% from previous quarter
content: On a year-on-year basis, however, the country's GDP fell for a second straight quarter, down 0.8% after having declined 0.9% in the first quarter.
summary: On a year-on-year basis, however, the country's GDP fell for a second straight quarter, down 0.8% after having declined 0.9% in the first quarter.

title: Starbucks is giving incoming CEO Brian Niccol $85 million in cash and stock as he departs Chipotle
content: Starbucks plans to pay incoming CEO Brian Niccol $10 million in cash and $75 million in equity awards when he joins the company from Chipotle.
summary: Starbucks plans to pay incoming CEO Brian Niccol $10 million in cash and $75 million in equity awards when he joins the company from Chipotle.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Inflation battle is 'absolutely' done
content: The S&P 500 closed higher for the fifth straight session. The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 242 points, while the Nasdaq Composite eked out a 0.03% gain.
summary: The S&P 500 closed higher for the fifth straight session. The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 242 points, while the Nasdaq Composite eked out a 0.03% gain.

title: Schumer says a crypto bill can pass Senate this year; key Dems join 'Crypto4Harris' call
content: Top Democrats joined virtual town hall to back crypto and a Kamala Harris administration.

title: Wizz Air launches $550 'all you can fly' annual subscription pass
content: Travelers in Europe can now take unlimited flights for 499 euros ($550) a year under a new travel subscription service from budget carrier Wizz Air.
summary: Travelers in Europe can now take unlimited flights for 499 euros ($550) a year under a new travel subscription service from budget carrier Wizz Air.

title: World's largest sovereign wealth fund posts $138 billion in first-half profit as AI demand boosts tech
content: Norway's massive sovereign wealth fund on Wednesday posted first-half profit of 1.48 trillion kroner ($138 billion).

title: Annual inflation rate slows to 2.9% in July, lowest since 2021
content: The consumer price index was expected to show a 0.2% increase in July and a 3% gain over the past year.

title: 'Pulling a Joe Biden': Reactions to Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida's resignation
content: One expert said the move was reminiscent of U.S. President Joe Biden dropping out of the presidential race less than a month ago.

title: How Elliott's monthslong Starbucks campaign got it a better deal than it asked for

title: Why NASA astronauts are waiting to return on Boeing's Starliner
content: Boeing's Starliner capsule "Calypso" has been in space for 71 days and counting as the company and NASA try to identify whether its safe for its crew to return.

title: Trump packs economic speech with personal attacks on Harris
content: The speech came as the Trump campaign retools its message after President Joe Biden withdrew his reelection bid and endorsed Harris as his replacement.

title: A U.S. construction boom is sending rents lower and creating perks for renters
content: Newly built apartment buildings are helping increase the supply of available rental units in some parts of the country. The result? Price cuts and added perks.
summary: Newly built apartment buildings are helping increase the supply of available rental units in some parts of the country. The result? Price cuts and added perks.

title: Britain considers tougher internet safety laws after riots, Musk comments â€” what you need to know

title: Reddit's increased reliance on Google traffic has Wall Street anxious to see if visitors sign up

title: Chinese tech giant Tencent's quarterly profit jumps 82% as key gaming unit accelerates

title: UBS CEO says it's too early to talk about a U.S. recession, but a slowdown is possible

title: Video game industry faces sluggish growth in 2024 amid weak console sales, research firm says

title: Intel sells stake in UK chip designer Arm amid company-wide restructuring and cost cuts

title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly gain as RBNZ cuts cash rate; Japan's Prime Minister Kishida to step down
